content.text: Analyze the following problem and its solution regarding grouping method for sandwiches and pies: Group 1 sandwich and 1 pie together. Cost of pie = $4 - $1.80 = $2.20. Cost of 1 group = $4 + $2.20 = $6.20. Number of groups = $279 \div $6.20 = 45. Total paid for pies = 45 x $2.20 = $99.
content.text_latex: Analyze the following problem and its solution regarding grouping method for sandwiches and pies: Group 1 sandwich and 1 pie together. Cost of pie = $4 - $1.80 = $2.20. Cost of 1 group = $4 + $2.20 = $6.20. No. of groups = $279 \div $6.20 = 45. Total paid for pies = 45 \times $2.20 = $99.
